'''Residual Pari of the Forest''' are [[NPC]]s located in [[Tunigi Hollow]], [[Sumeru]]. They were members of the [[Pari]] residing in Fravashi Trees that are awakened by the Traveler in the {{Quest|Pale Fire}}.
